root.title: PowerShell Deleted Mounted Share
root.description: Detects when when a mounted share is removed. Adversaries may remove share connections that are no longer useful in order to clean up traces of their operation
root.author: oscd.community, @redcanary, Zach Stanford @svch0st

logsource.definition: Requirements: Script Block Logging must be enabled

falsepositives.item: Administrators or Power users may remove their shares via cmd line
